title: Idea for story accessibility
body: I was about to read the new Malphite story and thought I recognized his authors name, and I had an idea that i thought could be pretty simple to implement : being able to click the author of the story to see what else they've written for Riot! I'd love to know what else they've written , especially the ones who's writing style i really enjoy. Just a thought :> !

replies.body: This is a great idea! Shared with the team to see if they can implement it.
Oh, and Luo actually means Camel in Chinese. Strange, I know.

Good catch! My real life last name is Luo and so my summoner name is a play on the children's song "Skip To My Lou" but....the deeper reference is that I was a big fan of streetball legend, Rafer Alston who went by the name Skip To My Lou :)
I mean, you can always check the [wiki](https://leagueoflegends.fandom.com/wiki/Graham_'Dinopawz'_McNeill), but it would be cool to have it on the official site.
